snippet.title: Alone in the Dark | David Harbour is Edward Carnby | Showcase Trailer 2023
snippet.description:
Get a first glimpse of David Harbour’s intense performance as Edward Carnby as he investigates a mysterious disappearance in the upcoming reimagining of Alone in the Dark. 

Embark on a journey to the mysterious Derceto Manor and experience this new nightmare from either Edward Carnby’s or Emily Hartwood’s perspective, played by Jodie Comer and David Harbour respectively. 

Download the Prologue and Pre-Order Alone in the Dark here: aloneinthedark.com 

- Links & Info -  
Steam: https://thqn.net/aitd-steam 
Website: https://aloneinthedark.com  
Discord: https://discord.gg/aloneinthedark 

- Our Socials -  
YouTube: https://youtube.com/THQNordic  
Twitter: https://twitter.com/AITDGame 
Facebook: https://facebook.com/aloneinthedarkgame 
Instagram: https://instagram.com/thqnordic  
TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@thqnordic  
Twitch: https://twitch.tv/thqnordic  

#AloneInTheDark #ReturnToDerceto #THQNordic2023
